trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown in a thread upon cancellation of an operation that the thread was executing.
trans-unit.target: 在取消執行緒所執行的作業時，執行緒中所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the task that was canceled had an associated cancellation token, it is returned by the <xref:System.OperationCanceledException.CancellationToken%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the token is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果已取消的工作具有相關聯的取消語彙基元，它由<xref:System.OperationCanceledException.CancellationToken%2A>屬性，而<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>語彙基元屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with a system-supplied error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用系統提供的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The operation was canceled."
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 作業已取消 」。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A nullreference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Nullreference (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token created in the non-canceled state.
trans-unit.target: 取消語彙基元在非取消的狀態下建立。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的內容必須能讓人了解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token created in the non-canceled state.
trans-unit.target: 取消語彙基元在非取消的狀態下建立。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token associated with the operation that was canceled.
trans-unit.target: 與已取消的作業相關聯的取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with a cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 使用取消語彙基元，初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The operation was canceled."
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 作業已取消 」。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A nullreference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Nullreference (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: `token`.
trans-unit.target: `token`。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的內容必須能讓人了解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property Type
trans-unit.target: 屬性類型

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 條件

trans-unit.source: `innerException`.
trans-unit.target: `innerException`。

trans-unit.source: `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message`。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token created in the non-canceled state.
trans-unit.target: 取消語彙基元在非取消的狀態下建立。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token associated with the operation that was canceled.
trans-unit.target: 與已取消的作業相關聯的取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with a specified error message and a cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息和取消語彙基元，初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的內容必須能讓人了解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message`。

trans-unit.source: `token`.
trans-unit.target: `token`。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token associated with the operation that was canceled.
trans-unit.target: 與已取消的作業相關聯的取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with a specified error message, a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception, and a cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息、造成這個例外狀況原因的內部例外狀況參考和取消語彙基元，初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的內容必須能讓人了解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property Type
trans-unit.target: 屬性類型

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 條件

trans-unit.source: `innerException`.
trans-unit.target: `innerException`。

trans-unit.source: `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message`。

trans-unit.source: `token`.
trans-unit.target: `token`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a token associated with the operation that was canceled.
trans-unit.target: 取得與已取消之作業相關聯的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: A token associated with the operation that was canceled, or a default token.
trans-unit.target: 與已取消之作業相關聯的語彙基元，或是預設語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: If the token is associated with a canceled operation, the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the token returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果語彙基元已取消作業，與相關聯<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>語彙基元的屬性會傳回`true`。
